Welcome to CheckVisa.

Predict the waiting time of your US visa administrative processing.

  • Input your visa information to get the prediction for your waiting time.*
  • After clearance, report your actual waiting time to help others.
  • Help us improve on statistical machine learning.
  • Read more...
*Predictions are made by searching our database for similar cases. No private information, such as name, address, or passport number, is collected.
